name: Stellar Version 1.0
description:
PLOT!

When 17 year old Sadie Finley discovers that her favorite fictional character from one of the video games she plays, Eugene Fellure, has somehow been transported to the real world, Sadie decides to embark on a journey to figure out how this happened and how the impossible could be possible.

Join Sadie and Eugene as they solve mysteries, face their fears, meet new friends, and most importantly- have some fun.

--- <3

FEATURES!

- An engaging, short, fun and interesting single-player visual novel experience
- Cute anime-inspired art style
- Original story with lots of lore, mysteries and easter eggs
- Battles of knowledge that are similar to trivia against your adversaries
- Fantasy and sci-fi themes
- Loveable characters
- LGBTQ+ representation

--- <3

A NOTE!

Hi, it's the developer, artist & writer of Stellar Version 1.0, Rachel! This is my first game EVER and I had a blast making it! Thank you for checking it out, I appreciate it!
The story of Stellar Version 1.0 is linear, but there are still a lot of mysteries to uncover and things to explore, so dive in!
Hope you enjoy!
